title: Nice Gothic Font
content:
Hi everyone

I'm new here and don't exactly know all the habits...

I just identified a font for myself, so I thought I could make others benefit from it, it's always nice to see a font in use !

the image is here:  
 [cool work](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826012415/http:/www.guiborchert.com/work/comic_book_327/comic_book1.jpg)

and the font is here [Gothic N°4](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826012415/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/creative_alliance/gothic_no_4/?sample_text=NEW%20MAGIA)

that's all, enjoy :)
author: baz the baz
